page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: {Primary Schools (5-11 Years) Sherrier C.of E. Primary School. 1985 on roll 447 + 16 teaching staff. New building opened in Jan. 1982. Wycliffe C.P. School. 1985 on roll 211 + 10 teaching staff. School first opened 1969. Wycliffe Parents Association. {Secondary Schools (11-19 Years) Lutterworth High School. 11-14 yrs. A comprehensive High School in the Leicestershire plan. 1985 on roll 830 + 42 teaching staff. Lutterworth Grammar School 14-19 yrs. and Community College. A comprehensive upper school in the Leicestershire plan. 1985 on roll 1442 + 100 teaching staff including 400 in sixth form. {Community College: Adult classes Affilliated societies
